title: Lvl 5 Spells
content:
he Mountain, Sorcerer, Wizard

Summon the apparitions of 6 master strategists. Each apparition strikes a target of your choosing, dealing 2d6 + 6 Force damage.

Conjure Elemental

Destructive Wave

Shred a foe's very essence by pulling on strands of the Weave. Dealing 10d6 + 20 (30~80) Necrotic Damage(CON Save to halve).

Dispel Evil and Good

Greater Restoration

Mass Cure Wounds

Lvl 5 Spells Gallery in Baldur's Gate 3
